panels.description: Shows distribution of executors by their current state
panels.title: Executors by state

panels.description: Rate of jobs that are successful over the specified interval.
panels.title: Job success rate

panels.description: Rate of jobs failing over the specified interval.
panels.title: Job failure rate

targets.expr: sum by (jenkins_job) ({__name__=~"$prefix\\_?jenkins_builds_failed_build_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}) and on (jenkins_job) bottomk(5, avg by (jenkins_job) ({__name__=~"$prefix\\_?jenkins_builds_health_score", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}))

sum by (jenkins_job) ({__name__=~"$prefix\\_?jenkins_builds_success_build_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}) and on (jenkins_job) bottomk(5, avg by (jenkins_job) ({__name__=~"$prefix\\_?jenkins_builds_health_score", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}))

sum by (jenkins_job) ({__name__=~"$prefix\\_jenkins_builds_failed_build_count|$prefix\\_?jenkins_builds_success_build_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}) and on (jenkins_job) bottomk(5, avg by (jenkins_job) ({__name__=~"$prefix\\_?jenkins_builds_health_score", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}))

panels.description: List of the top 5 slowest jobs.
panels.title: Top 5 slowest jobs

panels.description: Total web requests group by different HTTP status codes.
panels.title: Web request rate by status

panels.description: Shows a distribution of HTTP request durations by quantile.
panels.title: HTTP request duration by quantile
